price: Mi smo još prije Ibrahimu razboritost dali i dobro smo ga poznavali.
arabic: ۞ وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَآ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ رُشۡدَهُۥ مِن قَبۡلُ وَكُنَّا بِهِۦ عَٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā ib'rāhīma rush'dahu min qablu wakunnā bihi ʿālimīna
